law.catch_line: Penalty for violation of Sections 30-388.9 to 30-388.10.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.21. Penalty for violation of Sections 30-388.9 to 30-388.10.
All violations of Sections to and including [sic] shall be punishable by a fine not to exceed two hundred fifty dollars ($250.00) or imprisonment not to exceed thirty (30) days in the County Jail, or both, in the discretion of the County Judge.
